name: latex
description: Compile LaTeX documents from within Atom.

alwaysOpenResultInAtom.description: Always open result in Atom. Depends on the pdf-view package being installed.

builder.description: Select LaTeX builder. MiKTeX distribution is required for texify.

customEngine.description: Enter command for custom LaTeX engine. Overrides Engine.

moveResultToSourceDirectory.title: Move Result to Source Directory
moveResultToSourceDirectory.description: Ensures that the output file produced by a successful build is stored together with the TeX document that produced it.

outputDirectory.description: All files generated during a build will be redirected here. Leave blank if you want the build output to be stored in the same directory as the TeX document.

outputFormat.description: Output file format. DVI and PS currently only supported for latexmk.

skimPath.description: Full application path to Skim (OS X).

texPath.title: TeX Path
texPath.description: The full path to your TeX distribution's bin directory. Supports $PATH substitution.

useMasterFileSearch.description: Enables naive search for master/root file when building distributed documents. Does not affect 'Magic Comments' functionality.

viewerPath.title: Custom PDF viewer Path
viewerPath.description: Full application path to your PDF viewer. Overrides Skim and SumatraPDF options.
